description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Win32 kernel subsystem detailed in CVE-2024-30049:

1. Download the relevant updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 (32-bit systems): [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)

2. Install the downloaded updates by following the prompts in the Windows Update interface.

3. Restart your system after installation to apply the changes effectively.

**Details**:
- These updates resolve the use-after-free vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges on the affected system.
- Ensure that your system matches the specified build number prior to installation: 
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22621.3593
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22000.2960
   - Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: 10.0.10240.20651
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.19044.4412.
